channel.title: Run.bat help
channel.description:
This is What my run looks like [code]@echo off title Server cd ./bin/ java -cp .;mysql-connector-java-5.1.8-bin.jar -Xmx512m server.Server pause[/code]
and its giving me this error "Java is not recognized as an internal or external command" blah blah. so can someone give me a fix on this.. my enviorment variables are set up right

item.title: Run.bat help
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

no sorry i am on my ipod, But there was a tool released. You run it and click set varibles and your done… search for “Enviroment Variables” its by the user “Lin”

Read full topic
